metadata.title: CVE-2021-42220 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Dolibarr before 14.0.3via the ticket creation flow. Exploitation requires that an admin copiesthe payload into a box.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
